Shockwave/Koga Shuko:


Shockwave saw a skimmer hovering over the ground.  "Interesting.  That weapon 
could do to much damage to me." he said, referring to Blastrage who was 
controlling the grenade launcher.  Getting a target lock, he fired four 
missiles off at BH and Blastrage's skimmer.  

---

Koga Shuko "grinded his teeth" as he saw Shockwave open fire on one of the 
most powerful weapons under his command for now.  Taking precise aim and 
calculating, he fired three laser bolts, each digging into Shockwave's left 
wing, sending the Decepticon descending quickly, smashing into a forest, lost 
in the immense green.
"No one, messes, with Koga Shuko." he smiled, turning back to Cyber Claw, 
raising his missile launcher.  "We've told you what we know, our forces are 
newly arrived, we don't know much about your petty feuds.  So be gone and 
leave us alone!  Or you WILL die, as will all who oppose us."
